welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Santa Cruz, Ecuador! Get ready to be charmed by our vibrant city and its beautiful beaches. We invite you to immerse yourself in our culture, indulge in our delicious cuisine, and explore all that Santa Cruz has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"
